channel.title: Many ways to beat rapidshare download limits no waiting time
channel.description:
[b]1. Short-Out the JavaScript: [/b] 1. Goto the page you want to download 2. Select FREE button 3. In the address bar put the following: javascript:alert(c=0) 4. Click OK 5. Click OK to the pop-up box 6. Enter the captcha 7. Download Your File
[b]2. Request a new IP address from your ISP server.[/b]
Here's how to do it in windows: 1. Click Start 2. Click run 3. In the run box type cmd.exe and click OK 4. When the command prompt opens type the following. ENTER after each new line. [code]ipconfig /flushdns ipconfig /release ipconfig /renew exit[/code] 5. Erase your cookies in whatever browser you are using. 6. Try the rapidshare download again.
Frequently you will be assigned a new IP address when this happens. Sometime you will, sometimes you will not. If you are on a fixed IP address, this method will not work. To be honest, I do not know how to do this in linux/unix/etc. If this works for you, you may want to save the above commands into a batch file, and just run it when you need it.
[b]3. Use a proxy with SwitchProxy and Firefox:[/b] 1. download firefox at[url=http://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox/]http://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox/[/url] 2. Download and install switch proxy [url=http://mozmonkey.com/switchproxy/]http://mozmonkey.com/switchproxy/[/url] 3.Google for free proxies http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF-8&rls=GGLD,GGLD:2004-42,GGLD:en&q=proxy+lists 4. When you hit your download limit, clean your cookies and change your proxy
[b]4. Use an anonymous service: [/b] Running your system through the tor network should in theory work; however, it is difficult to use and setup. Plus, you allow others to run their evil deeds through your system as well by using this system. Anonymizer 2005 is inexpensive, easy to use, but not free. Other pay services would likely work as well. TOR-http://tor.eff.org/ ANONYMIZER 2005-http://www.tkqlhce.com/c2111biroiq57CF767C5769E6988
. You can use a bookmarklet to stop your wait times:
1. Open IE 2. Right Click On This Link-[ftp=ftp://javascript:var%20c=0;]javascript:var%20c=0;[/ftp] 3. Select Add to Favorites 4. Select Yes to the warning that the bookmark may be unsafe. 5. Name it "RapidShare No Wait" 6. Click on the Links folder (if you want to display it in your IE toolbar) 7. Click OK 8. You may need to close and reopen IE to see it 9. Goto rapidshare and click the bookmarklet when you are forced to wait
Taken from:http://www.tech-recipes.com/rx/869/rapidshare_hacks_beat_download_limits_waiting_time
This is another tut: Download:[url=http://uploadfile.org/download.php?id=uAYTcoCg3yldMUTMOKXY]http://uploadfile.org/download.php?id=uAYTcoCg3yldMUTMOKXY[/url]
Download From Rapidshare Easily
Package 1 :
i have packed some working appz into one archive!! There is a tool which will reset time limit from your ip which is working for me!! i have also added a web tool just upload those files which i have added in this archive on your site and than open your site it will work as a web server which will download from rapidshare through your web hosting and will save the file in your site than u can download with the help of download managers or what ever!!
note: you can upload rapid leecher v2.2 on any free web hosting company which supports php!!
Package 2 :
I have again added two more working appz just check it out!!
No1: Proxy Switcher
A very good working application which switches your proxy easily!! just download and try!!
No2: RapidKill PRO 5.6 (Now you can download from any filehosting) Updated!!
RapidKill is a PHP based application
Installation - Upload all (ten) files to your PHP-enabled host (MySQL is not required) - CHMOD the directory to 777 - Copy and Paste the link of Rapidshare/MegaUpload/whatever that is supported above - The script will fetch it directly to your host. - Go to config.php and make more possible changes if you like. it is not made by me...

item.title: Many ways to beat rapidshare download limits no waiting time
item.dc:creator: @jonckr jonckr
item.description:
@jonckr wrote:

1. Short-Out the JavaScript:

1. Goto the page you want to download
2. Select FREE button
3. In the address bar put the following: javascript:alert(c=0)
4. Click OK
5. Click OK to the pop-up box
6. Enter the captcha
7. Download Your File

2. Request a new IP address from your ISP server.

  Here's how to do it in windows:
  1. Click Start
  2. Click run
  3. In the run box type cmd.exe and click OK
  4. When the command prompt opens type the following. ENTER after each new line.

ipconfig /flushdns ipconfig /release ipconfig /renew exit
5. Erase your cookies in whatever browser you are using.
6. Try the rapidshare download again.

Frequently you will be assigned a new IP address when this happens. Sometime you will, sometimes you will not. If you are on a fixed IP address, this method will not work. To be honest, I do not know how to do this in linux/unix/etc. If this works for you, you may want to save the above commands into a batch file, and just run it when you need it.

3. Use a proxy with SwitchProxy and Firefox:

  1. download firefox athttp://www.mozilla.org/products/firefox/
  2. Download and install switch proxy http://mozmonkey.com/switchproxy/
    3.Google for free proxies http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF-8&rls=GGLD,GGLD:2004-42,GGLD:en&q=proxy+lists
  3. When you hit your download limit, clean your cookies and change your proxy

4. Use an anonymous service:

Running your system through the tor network should in theory work; however, it is difficult to use and setup. Plus, you allow others to run their evil deeds through your system as well by using this system. Anonymizer 2005 is inexpensive, easy to use, but not free. Other pay services would likely work as well.
TOR-http://tor.eff.org/
ANONYMIZER 2005-http://www.tkqlhce.com/c2111biroiq57CF767C5769E6988

. You can use a bookmarklet to stop your wait times:

  1. Open IE
  2. Right Click On This Link-[ftp=ftp://javascript:var%20c=0;]javascript:var%20c=0;[/ftp]
  3. Select Add to Favorites
  4. Select Yes to the warning that the bookmark may be unsafe.
  5. Name it "RapidShare No Wait"
  6. Click on the Links folder (if you want to display it in your IE toolbar)
  7. Click OK
  8. You may need to close and reopen IE to see it
  9. Goto rapidshare and click the bookmarklet when you are forced to wait

Taken from:http://www.tech-recipes.com/rx/869/rapidshare_hacks_beat_download_limits_waiting_time

This is another tut:
Download:http://uploadfile.org/download.php?id=uAYTcoCg3yldMUTMOKXY

Download From Rapidshare Easily

Package 1 :

i have packed some working appz into one archive!!
There is a tool which will reset time limit from your ip which is working for me!!
i have also added a web tool just upload those files which i have added in this archive on your site and than open your site it will work as a web server which will download from rapidshare through your web hosting and will save the file in your site than u can download with the help of download managers or what ever!!

note: you can upload rapid leecher v2.2 on any free web hosting company which supports php!!

Package 2 :

I have again added two more working appz just check it out!!

No1: Proxy Switcher

A very good working application which switches your proxy easily!! just download
and try!!

No2: RapidKill PRO 5.6 (Now you can download from any filehosting) Updated!!

RapidKill is a PHP based application

Installation

  • Upload all (ten) files to your PHP-enabled host (MySQL is not required)
  • CHMOD the directory to 777
  • Copy and Paste the link of Rapidshare/MegaUpload/whatever that is supported above
  • The script will fetch it directly to your host.
  • Go to config.php and make more possible changes if you like.
    it is not made by me…
